result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.orig: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar
result.html: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.orig: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.html: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibriṫe a ṁeallaḋ as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.

result.eng: So, they started buying workers from Africa.
result.ga: Thosaíodar mar sin ag ceannach oibrithe as an Afraic
result.orig: Thosaíodar mar sin ag ceannach oibrithe as an Afraic
result.html: Thosaíodar mar sin ag ceannach oibrithe as an AfraicSo, they started buying workers from Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaíodar mar sin ag ceannaċ oibriṫe as an AfraicSo, they started buying workers from Africa.
